item.content:encoded:
During journey, we have to face with logistics logistics, so an emergency response plan is a must

  • Keeping track of condition of containers during journey
  • Use the ISO container inspection checklist
View details

item.title: Our Process - After journey
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
Our process will continue after journey by checking all tasks were completed to find out issues

  • Write a short detailed report
  • Get customer feedback on the logistics service quality
  • Complete incident management checklist
View details

item.title: Rail freight
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
All Services

  • Rail freight
  • Sea freight
  • Land freight
  • Air freight
  • Warehousing
  • Custom clearance

Do you need support?

Contact us now

Our freight transport services are fast, efficient and reliable, even under these challenging circumstances. We deliver goods on time withour trafic jams at the borders and operate with our own traction services in 20 different countries. We can increase its capacities according to clients' demand.

Previous Next

Odio risus mauris semper duis ullamcorper duis felis. Quis interdum condimentum viverra at nulla tristique laoreet egestas pellentesque. Erat et fermentum varius varius.

Our strengths and advantages

Our strengths and advantages make us different from our competitors and we always is one of transportation and logistics firms customers expect to conduct their shipments

Thanks to our enthusiastic employees who make sure all goods reach destinations in a fast and safe way. We are doing everything so that consignments reach their destinations. Flexible and environmentally friendly rail services provides reliable and pre-defined scheduled departures.

  • Competitive rates
  • Advanced technology
  • 24/7 support
  • Always on time
  • Fast and realiable
  • Safe packaging

We are proud to serve more than 3,000 customers and are the most environment friendly mode of land transportation, so our rail freight service is always the top choice.

Download service brochures

item.title: Sea freight
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
All Services

  • Rail freight
  • Sea freight
  • Land freight
  • Air freight
  • Warehousing
  • Custom clearance

Do you need support?

Contact us now

Our freight transport services are fast, efficient and reliable, even under these challenging circumstances. We deliver goods on time withour trafic jams at the borders and operate with our own traction services in 20 different countries. We can increase its capacities according to clients' demand.

Previous Next

Odio risus mauris semper duis ullamcorper duis felis. Quis interdum condimentum viverra at nulla tristique laoreet egestas pellentesque. Erat et fermentum varius varius.

Our strengths and advantages

Our strengths and advantages make us different from our competitors and we always is one of transportation and logistics firms customers expect to conduct their shipments

Thanks to our enthusiastic employees who make sure all goods reach destinations in a fast and safe way. We are doing everything so that consignments reach their destinations. Flexible and environmentally friendly rail services provides reliable and pre-defined scheduled departures.

  • Competitive rates
  • Advanced technology
  • 24/7 support
  • Always on time
  • Fast and realiable
  • Safe packaging

We are proud to serve more than 3,000 customers and are the most environment friendly mode of land transportation, so our rail freight service is always the top choice.

Download service brochures

item.title: Air freight
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
All Services

  • Rail freight
  • Sea freight
  • Land freight
  • Air freight
  • Warehousing
  • Custom clearance

Do you need support?

Contact us now

Our freight transport services are fast, efficient and reliable, even under these challenging circumstances. We deliver goods on time withour trafic jams at the borders and operate with our own traction services in 20 different countries. We can increase its capacities according to clients' demand.

Previous Next

Odio risus mauris semper duis ullamcorper duis felis. Quis interdum condimentum viverra at nulla tristique laoreet egestas pellentesque. Erat et fermentum varius varius.

Our strengths and advantages

Our strengths and advantages make us different from our competitors and we always is one of transportation and logistics firms customers expect to conduct their shipments

Thanks to our enthusiastic employees who make sure all goods reach destinations in a fast and safe way. We are doing everything so that consignments reach their destinations. Flexible and environmentally friendly rail services provides reliable and pre-defined scheduled departures.

  • Competitive rates
  • Advanced technology
  • 24/7 support
  • Always on time
  • Fast and realiable
  • Safe packaging

We are proud to serve more than 3,000 customers and are the most environment friendly mode of land transportation, so our rail freight service is always the top choice.

Download service brochures

item.title: Warehousing
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
All Services

  • Rail freight
  • Sea freight
  • Land freight
  • Air freight
  • Warehousing
  • Custom clearance

Do you need support?

Contact us now

With global network and modern facilities, our warehousing service is ready to solve with your supply chain, whether at origin or destination. By experiencing our warehousing and distribution service, complexity is reduced, and you gain speed, control and visibility. You'll reduce delivery cost.

Previous Next

Location :

2972 Westheimer Rd. Santa Ana, Illinois 85486

Compliance :

ISO9001:2008, FTZ, TS16949:2002, FDA Regulation

Dimension :

Length 250 M, Width 80 M, 12 Meter

Roof slope :

1 : 10

Crane System :

Applicable

Many of our facilities are ideally situated close to key ocean ports for major shipping routes, allowing faster throughput of your cargo. We offer various services depending on where your cargo come we can straight transload, or building consignments direct to distribution centre.

Finally, we will combine our warehousing with our transportation forms: inland transportation road, rail, sea freight and air freight to help your cargo to flow smoothly.

What we can do for you :

Customize according to needs

We can customize our service according to the amount of goods you want to store.

Reduce your costs

You will not have to invest to build and operate a private warehouse

Shorten your cycle time

Shorten your cycle time is the benefit warehousing service bring for businesses.

Increase operation efficiency

Warehousing service help reduce cost & save you time

What we can do for you :

Short-term storage solution

Sharing warehouse solution

Self-managed warehouse leasing solution

Download service brochures

item.title: Custom clearance
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
All Services

  • Rail freight
  • Sea freight
  • Land freight
  • Air freight
  • Warehousing
  • Custom clearance

Do you need support?

Contact us now

Supply chain management is a complex operation because of trade barriers and customs compliance requirements. Therefore, we have solutions that are tailored-made to your flow of goods. We help you to clear your shipments on schedule. Regardless of volume, scope or scale.

Previous Next

Whether you import or export goods, we offer a wide range of services to fit your supply chain. We will help you prepare and process declarations, calculate duties and taxes, and organize inspections. With our service, you can reduce risks and manage costs on your cross-border transactions

Benefits

Odio risus mauris semper duis ullamcorper duis felis. Quis interdum condimentum viverra at nulla tristique laoreet egestas pellentesque. Erat et fermentum varius varius.

  • Work according to your demands
  • Provide advising
  • Analyze all the documentation
  • Avoid delays of delivery
  • Maintain the quality of goods

We cover:

You can get all benefits of custom clearance service, including being proactive with changes in customs regulations, procedures, and licenses that impact your business.

  • Import Clearance :
  • Precise duties-payment process
  • Efficient data entry management
  • Document compliance review
  • Accurate import declarations filings
  • Export Clearance :
  • Compliant & accurate export filings
  • Origin management of merchandise
  • Management of merchandise licenses
  • Document compliance review
  • In-transit declarations :
  • Efficient declaration filings
  • Managing the further movement
  • Providing timely the merchandise
  • Minimising delays of journey
Download service brochures

item.title: Home 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="home-1" slidertitle="Home 1"][/rev_slider]

Top transportation and logistics company

Provides high quality, comprehensive transportation services and always understand client's requirements.

Sea freight

Sea freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa.

Air freight

Air freight agent for major and reliable airlines with high frequency of flights.

Rail freight

Offer secure, reliable and environmentally friendly rail freight transportation.

Land freight

We are the high quality and and highly secured road transportation provider.

Warehousing

We have facilities ready to handle your supply chain, at origin or destination.

Custom clearance

Our company can guide you through shipment customs clearance process.

Rail freight

Secure rail freight transportation service.

Sea freight

Sea freight transportation service.

Our transportation

Transportation service ensures a smooth and on time border crossing of shipments.

  • Sea freight
  • Air freight
  • Rail freight
  • Land freight
See more services

Specialist for transportation.

We provide comprehensive transportation services for our partners on the globe and always offer innovative solutions to deal with complex logistics challenges.

About us 0 Completed Delivery 0 + Awards Winnerx 500 Satisfied Clients Team Members

Our process

Before journey During journey After journey Before journey

We guarantee strict compliance to all procedures before, during and after journey.

  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
View details
During journey

During journey, we have to face with logistics logistics, so an emergency response plan is a must

  • Keeping track of condition of containers during journey
  • Use the ISO container inspection checklist
View details
After journey

Our process will continue after journey by checking all tasks were completed to find out issues

  • Write a short detailed report
  • Get customer feedback on the logistics service quality
  • Complete incident management checklist
View details

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

Leslie Alexander

New York

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

Bessie Cooper

Dubai

Truck driver

Bessie Cooper

Procurement manager

Cody Fisher

Our talent and professional members

Meet friendly, experienced, knowledgeable and dynamic team members who always make our customers pleased with.

Procurement manager

Floyd Miles

Warehouse manager

Eleanor Pena

Marketing manager

Dianne Russell

Procurement manager

Cody Fisher

Our goal is to bring joy and prosperity to the people we serve. We always offer creative solutions to prepare for logistics challenges in the future

Get in touch with us

Contact us on direct, by phone or fill out the form to receive a free consultation from our enthusiastic staff.

Phone number
  • (480) 555-0103
Email
  • kenzi.lawson@example.com
Address
  • 4140 Parker Rd. Allentown, New Mexico 31134

Ronald Richards proudly works as a procurement manager in our office where he continues to follow his passion. He always be hard working , patient, creative and like to learn new things from his colleagues and talent leaders. Our partners and clients always satisfy with his performance.
He grew up in London where he also obtained his Bachelors degree in this city. He participated in procurement employee training courses when he was a student and.
Ronald Richards has 8 years of experience as a procurement manager in several logistics companies. His clients always pleased his great work and professional attitude.

a:4:{i:0;a:2:{s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_year";s:11:"2012 - 2014";s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_desc";s:136:"During these years, he was a hardworking trainee in Business Department for a small transportation and logistics company in London city.";}i:1;a:2:{s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_year";s:9:"2014-2016";s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_desc";s:168:"in these 2 years, he moved to Manchester city and he worked as a a procurement employee for a famous logistic firms over the world and his boss pleased his performance.";}i:2;a:2:{s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_year";s:11:"2016 - 2018";s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_desc";s:136:"During this period of time, he worked in our office as a excellent procurement employee. He kept improving the needed skills for his job";}i:3;a:2:{s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_year";s:11:"2018 - 2021";s:21:"ova_team_met_exp_desc";s:132:"From 2018 to now, he has been appointed to hold the position of purchasing manager of our company and he has supported his employees";}}
To develop his own career, he often participate in professional training programs to learn new things and improve his performance. He always get respect from co-workers

item.title: Home 2
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="home-2" slidertitle="Home 2"][/rev_slider]

About Us

We provide comprehensive transportation services for our partners globally and help theme deal with complex logistics challenges.

  • Enhancing on-time delivery performance.
  • Reducing freight transportation costs
  • Guaranteeing timely
  • No penalties and delays with journeys
About us

Our transportation

Transportation service ensures a smooth and on time border crossing of shipments, guaranteeing timely with the competitive rates

Sea freight

Cargo agent for major airlines, reliable with high flight frequency, even with the overloading cargo...

Air freight

Cargo agent for major airlines, reliable with high flight frequency, even with the overloading cargo...

Rail freight

Cargo agent for major airlines, reliable with high flight frequency, even with the overloading cargo...

Land freight

Cargo agent for major airlines, reliable with high flight frequency, even with the overloading cargo...

Top transportation and logistics company

Provides high quality, comprehensive transportation services and always understand client's requirements.

Sea freight

Sea freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa.

Air freight

Air freight agent for major and reliable airlines with high frequency of flights.

Rail freight

Offer secure, reliable and environmentally friendly rail freight transportation.

Land freight

We are the high quality and and highly secured road transportation provider.

Warehousing

We have facilities ready to handle your supply chain, at origin or destination.

Custom clearance

Our company can guide you through shipment customs clearance process.

Our process

We guarantee strict compliance to all procedures in journeys.

1

Before journey

  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
2

During journey

During journey, we have to face with logistics logistics, so an emergency response plan is a must

  • Emergency response plan
3

After journey

Our process will continue after journey by checking all tasks were completed to find out issues

  • Incident management checklist

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

Team members

Meet friendly, experienced and knowledgeable members who make our customers pleased with.

See more

Bessie Cooper

Truck driver

Cody Fisher

Procurement manager

Dianne Russell

Marketing manager

Eleanor Pena

Warehouse manager

Our goal is to bring joy and prosperity to the people we serve. We always offer creative solutions to prepare for logistics challenges in the future

Get in touch with us

Contact us on direct, by phone or fill out the form to receive a free consultation from our enthusiastic staff.

Phone number
  • (480) 555-0103
Email
  • kenzi.lawson@example.com
Address
  • 4140 Parker Rd. Allentown, New Mexico 31134

item.title: Home 3
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="home-3" slidertitle="Home 3"][/rev_slider] 0 Completed Delivery 500 Satisfied Clients 0 Awards Winnerx Team Members

Our transportation

Sea freight Air freight Rail freight Land freight Sea freight
Sea freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa for clients.
  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
View details
Air freight
Air freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa for clients.
  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
View details
Rail freight
Rail freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa for clients.
  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
View details
Land freight
Land freight transportation is offered from home to abroad and vice versa for clients.
  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
View details

Services we offer

Provides high quality and comprehensive transportation services with competitive rates and always understand client's requirements.

Pick-up

Package

Delivery

Warehousing

Custom clearance

Our process

We guarantee strict compliance to all procedures in journeys. 1

Before journey

  • Standard operating procedures for vehicle maintenance
  • Journey management plan
  • Standard operating procedures for loading
2

During journey

During journey, we have to face with logistics logistics, so an emergency response plan is a must
  • Emergency response plan
3

After journey

Our process will continue after journey by checking all tasks were completed to find out issues
  • Incident management checklist
We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays Leslie Alexander New York We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays Bessie Cooper Dubai

Team members

Meet friendly, experienced and knowledgeable members who make our customers pleased with.

Leslie Alexander

Warehouse manager

Eleanor Pena

Warehouse manager

Marvin McKinney

Procurement manager

Floyd Miles

Procurement manager
Our goal is to bring joy and prosperity to the people we serve. We always offer creative solutions to prepare for logistics challenges in the future

Get in touch with us

Contact us on direct, by phone or fill out the form to receive a free consultation from our enthusiastic staff. Phone number
  • (480) 555-0103
Email
  • kenzi.lawson@example.com
Address
  • 4140 Parker Rd. Allentown, New Mexico 31134
[contact-form-7 id="882" title="Contact Us"]

News updates and useful tips for logistics & transportation

Provide you news updates to help you handle logistics challenges as well as crucial information about transportation for businesses See more 20, Nov 2021

Train for all small businesses.

19, Nov 2021

Your Logistics Issues

22, Oct 2021

Container sea freight cost

Our network

[Network]

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
About company

Global Leading business

We have built a team of employees, who are participated in professional training courses , are groomed to handle any emerging situation with a level of composure that gives the customer peace of mind.

CEO Jenny Wilson

Our mission Our vision Our mission

Offering our customers the opportunity to conduct their shipments in a friendly environmental way

  • Superior transportation and logistics services
  • Guarantee on-time delivery
  • The most cost-effective delivery for clients
Explore more
Our vision

Offering our customers the opportunity to conduct their shipments in a friendly environmental way

  • Guarantee on-time delivery
  • Superior transportation and logistics services
  • The most cost-effective delivery for clients
Explore more
0 Completed Delivery 500 Satisfied Clients 0 + Awards Winnerx Team Members

What Make Us Special

Our strengths and advantages make us different from our competitors that meets all our customers' demand

Competitive rates

Offer low cost for transportation & logistics services

always on time

Guarantee on-time delivery with all our customers

advanced technology

Enhance our performance with modern technology

fast and realiable

A mandatory requirement for logistics companies

24/7 support

We answer all your questions anytime you need us

safe packaging

Ensure safety for cargo with our careful packaging

Our talent and professional members

Theresa Webb

Supply chain consultant

Marvin McKinney

Procurement manager

Leslie Alexander

Warehouse manager

Floyd Miles

Procurement manager

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

Bessie Cooper

Dubai

We are proud to be the Transflash's long-term partner. They help me quickly deliver cargo to our Singapore clients, without penalties and delays

Leslie Alexander

New York

item.title: Our clients
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
Duis mollis et phasellus massa sodales nulla fames volutpat a. Parturient integer hendrerit sit sed diam

Darrell Steward

Founder of DLG

Transflash team is amazing. They work in a Professional, timely, communicative way. When we face logistics challenges, they always find the right solution to deal with them. I would highly recommend to my friends

Ronald Richards

CEO of a law firm

Works like a charm. I love services of Transflash and would highly recommend to my friend and partners. I pleasant with your great performance and your professional attitude.

Kristin Watson

Manager of HG

I want to express my appreciation to your team. I hired you to organize shipping my cargo from Singapore to America. The service is excellent from start to finish. You supported me 24/7 during the journey.

Marvin McKinney

Founder of DLG

Transflash team is amazing. They work in a Professional, timely, communicative way. When we face logistics challenges, they always find the right solution to deal with them. I would highly recommend to my friends

Our clients

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
Get in touch with us

Contact us on direct, by phone or fill out the form to receive a free consultation from our enthusiastic staff.

Phone number
  • (480) 555-0103
Email
  • kenzi.lawson@example.com
Address
  • 4140 Parker Rd. Allentown, New Mexico 31134
[contact-form-7 id="882" title="Contact Us"]

Head office

Phone number :
(480) 555-0103
Email :
kenzi.lawson@example.com
Working Hours
T2 - T6 8:00 - 17:00
Adress :
4140 Parker Rd. Allentown, New Mexico 31134

item.title: Career
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:
Why works with us:

At our company, you can create a whole new path for yourself, so you should take success into your hands. We entrust people with responsibilities early in their career.

  • We put people first
  • We create the future
  • We embrace change
  • We offer good perks
  • Hot jobs

We are looking for a truck driver who will be responsible for the safe and timely delivery of goods.

Position : Truck driver Offered Salary: $1000 - 1500 Availability: Full time Vacancy: 5 Benefits:
  • Work with friendly, hard-working and kind colleges.
  • We offer attractive benefit packages.
  • Bonuses, health insurance, training programs, team work activities.
Responsibility:
  • Drive long distances to deliver goods to clients.
  • Report road incidents to the dispatcher.
  • Load and unload cargo, Refuel and clean vehicle, Inspect trucks and record issues.
Join our team

You may interest in

Ronald Richards proudly works as a procurement manager in our office where he continues to follow his passion. He always be hard working , patient, creative and like to learn new things from his colleagues and talent leaders. Our partners and clients always satisfy with his performance.
He grew up in London where he also obtained his Bachelors degree in this city. He participated in procurement employee training courses when he was a student and.
Ronald Richards has 8 years of experience as a procurement manager in several logistics companies. His clients always pleased his great work and professional attitude.

item.title: Get a quote
item.dc:creator: dung
item.content:encoded:

[select commodity placeholder "Commodity" "Ganeral" "Fragile goods" "Fine art"]
[text* weight placeholder "Weight"]
[text* destination placeholder "Destination"]
[text* dimensions placeholder "Dimensions"]
